example.description: This example adds a new tag to a workspace named ws-wsname. The tag has a key of "Name", and a key value of "AWS_Workspace".

example.code:
$tag = New-Object Amazon.WorkSpaces.Model.Tag $tag.Key = "Name" $tag.Value = "AWS_Workspace"
$tag2 = New-Object Amazon.WorkSpaces.Model.Tag $tag2.Key = "Stage" $tag2.Value = "Test" New-WKSTag -Region us-west-2 -WorkspaceId ws-wsname -Tag $tag,$tag2
example.description: This example adds multiple tags to a workspace named ws-wsname. One tag has a key of "Name" and a key value of "AWS_Workspace"; the other tag has a tag key of "Stage" and a key value of "Test".
